Astrix Framework 0.38.2

The Astrix Framework simplifies development and maintainence of microservices.

See: Description

Packages 
Package Description
com.avanza.astrix.beans.api  
com.avanza.astrix.beans.config
Core configuration abstractions used to read settings for AstrixContext and Astrix Beans.
com.avanza.astrix.beans.configdiscovery
ServiceDiscoveryFactoryPlugin to do service discovery by reading configuration.
com.avanza.astrix.beans.core
Core abstractions used by the framework.
com.avanza.astrix.beans.factory
Generic Factory implementation used to manage life-cycle for each api published using Astrix.
com.avanza.astrix.beans.ft
Defines the core abstractions for protecting a method invocation by some fault-tolerance mechanism.
com.avanza.astrix.beans.publish
Provides the core representations of a library- and service- bean definitions used to publish an api using Astrix.
com.avanza.astrix.beans.registry
Contains the core representations for service discovery and self service registrion using service registry.
com.avanza.astrix.beans.service
Contains the core representations and implementation of service beans in Astrix.
com.avanza.astrix.beans.util
Internal utilities used by the framework
com.avanza.astrix.config
A framework containing core abstractions for dynamic configuration lookup.
com.avanza.astrix.context
Contains the AstrixContext.
com.avanza.astrix.context.mbeans
Internal utility to centralize management of MBean's exported by the framework.
com.avanza.astrix.context.metrics
Defines core abstractions used to expose metrics from the framework.

com.avanza.astrix.gs.localview
ServiceComponent implementation allowing a local-view to be exported as a service in astrix.
com.avanza.astrix.gs.remoting
ServiceComponent implementation providing remoting using a space as transport.

com.avanza.astrix.metrics  
com.avanza.astrix.modules
A light-weight modularization framework that allows independent modules to explicitly define every exported element that is available outside the module.
